title: [Large-scale] Online Science Education Design and Rubric-Based Assessment Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and subject-matter expertise in science
context.additional_context: Environment enabling real-time collaboration and self-directed learning for working professionals with time constraints

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design core components (objectives, content, assessment) of online science education modules.
The validity of project-based assessments can be verified using rubrics, and improvement strategies can be proposed.
A process for continuously improving online instructional design quality through peer feedback and self-assessment can be applied.

resources: Science Domain Standard Online Lecture Samples

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
